00020 BusIfInterfaceSystem::BusIfInterfaceSystem(General::InterfaceMode mode,
00021                                                                                    BusIfGeneralTab* generalTab,
00022                                                                                    LibraryInterface* libHandler,
00023                                                                                    BusInterface* busif,
00024                                                                                    QWidget *parent): 
00025 BusIfInterfaceModeEditor(busif, parent), 
00026 mode_(mode),
00027 generalTab_(generalTab), 
00028 libHandler_(libHandler), 
00029 group_(this) {
00030 
00031         Q_ASSERT_X((mode == General::SYSTEM || mode == General::MIRROREDSYSTEM),
00032                 "BusIfInterfaceSystem constructor",
00033                 "Invalid mode given for the editor");
00034 
00035         group_.setProperty("mandatoryField", true);
00036 
00037         QFormLayout* layout = new QFormLayout(this);
00038         layout->addRow(tr("Group name of the system"), &group_);
00039 
00040         restoreChanges();
00041 }
00042 
00043 BusIfInterfaceSystem::~BusIfInterfaceSystem() {
00044 }
00045 
00046 bool BusIfInterfaceSystem::isValid() const {
00047         return !group_.currentText().isEmpty();
00048 }
00049 
00050 void BusIfInterfaceSystem::restoreChanges() {
00051         
00052         // update the combobox to display only the possible values
00053         updateDisplay();
00054 
00055         // select the value 
00056         int index = group_.findText(busIf()->getSystem());
00057         group_.setCurrentIndex(index);
00058 }
00059 
00060 void BusIfInterfaceSystem::applyChanges() {
00061         busIf()->setInterfaceMode(mode_);
00062         busIf()->setSystem(group_.currentText());
00063 }
00064 
00065 void BusIfInterfaceSystem::updateDisplay() {
00066         // the text that was selected
00067         QString oldText = group_.currentText();
00068         
00069         group_.clear();
00070 
00071         
00072         VLNV busDefVLNV = generalTab_->getBusType();
00073         if (!busDefVLNV.isValid())
00074                 return;
00075 
00076         if (!libHandler_->contains(busDefVLNV)) {
00077                 emit errorMessage(tr("The selected bus type does not exist in library."));
00078                 return;
00079         }
00080 
00081         QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComb = libHandler_->getModel(busDefVLNV);
00082         
00083         // if library did not contain given bus definition
00084         if (!libComb) {
00085                 emit errorMessage(tr("No Bus Definition with given VLNV was found."));
00086                 return;
00087         }
00088 
00089         // if the library component with given vlnv was not a bus definition
00090         else if (libComb->getVlnv()->getType() != VLNV::BUSDEFINITION) {
00091                 emit errorMessage(tr("Bus type VLNV was wrong type"));
00092                 return;
00093         }
00094 
00095         QSharedPointer<BusDefinition> busDef = libComb.staticCast<BusDefinition>();
00096         QStringList groupList = busDef->getSystemGroupNames();
00097 
00098         // add the system names to the list
00099         group_.addItems(groupList);
00100 
00101         // select the same text that was previously selected if it still can be found
00102         int index = group_.findText(oldText);
00103         group_.setCurrentIndex(index);
00104 }
00105 
00106 General::InterfaceMode BusIfInterfaceSystem::getInterfaceMode() const {
00107         return mode_;
00108 }
